explanation: The stage direction describes an action where Fritelin and his Master appear on stage, Fritelin goes down into the crowd and makes them form a circle, while a viol player and a rebec player sound their instruments. These actions pertain to the category of 'action' as they involve general character movement and interaction within the scene.
stgdir: Fritelin et son Maître apparaissent sur le petit théâtre. Fritelin descend dans la foule et la fait ranger en cercle. Un joueur de viole et un joueur de rebec sonnent de leurs instruments.
